0a6306cae406df1b23e52d503b22768210c72fb6.query:
INSERT INTO validators (
                    identity_key,
                    consensus_key,
                    sequence_number,
                    name,
                    website,
                    description,
                    voting_power,
                    validator_state,
                    unbonding_epoch
                ) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9)

1329be38905d802df374dc416fd0ce36d0b556af.query:
SELECT identity_key, epoch, validator_reward_rate, validator_exchange_rate
            FROM validator_rates
            WHERE epoch = (SELECT MAX(epoch) from base_rates)

155f64fb6352d1170eb4df09f7bf64c98edbfbf8.query: INSERT INTO base_rates VALUES ($1, $2, $3) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT base_rates_pkey DO UPDATE SET base_reward_rate=$2, base_exchange_rate=$3

1f5d0fb80de71c6cfbe06d1fd186b85c18d64e73.query: SELECT nullifier FROM nullifiers WHERE nullifier = ANY($1) AND reverted_height IS NULL

23271acfbb896cd6a0875d6420c5dad66e5ff20d.query: UPDATE quarantined_notes SET reverted_height = $1 WHERE note_commitment = $2

302a33ec1eec61c43e6b5507b6e059e3c9f61c6d.query:
SELECT height, note_commitment, ephemeral_key, encrypted_note
                    FROM notes
                    WHERE height BETWEEN $1 AND $2
                    ORDER BY position ASC

321616ee11510c15f5ac2d1e6aa3c22c5f6601b9.query:
WITH a AS
            (SELECT COUNT(*) AS nullifier_count FROM nullifiers),
            b AS
            (SELECT COUNT(*) AS note_count FROM notes)
            SELECT nullifier_count, note_count FROM a, b

39b5b249c803249b252343e112173acd656ad554.query:
SELECT validator_identity_key, nullifier
            FROM nullifiers
            WHERE
                unbonding_height IS NOT NULL AND
                unbonding_height <= $1 AND
                ($2 OR validator_identity_key = ANY($3)) AND
                reverted_height IS NULL

3f13d5f8a2ffc438e79f3297b7dfbcc14ffca761.query:
INSERT INTO blobs (id, data) VALUES ('nct', $1)
            ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET data = $1

3fad9360a2ca39e075d04e3ac0f5fc2bca9159ba.query:
SELECT unbonding_height AS height, nullifier
                    FROM nullifiers
                    WHERE
                        height BETWEEN $1 AND $2 AND
                        reverted_height IS NULL
                    ORDER BY unbonding_height ASC

40da344f10b8dfccf3ebc3ac7c44f028bdef4b92.query: SELECT validator_identity_key, delegation_change FROM delegation_changes WHERE epoch = $1

4501b3fc1446d51abde3513efb7df1201092a969.query:
INSERT INTO validator_fundingstreams (
                        identity_key,
                        address,
                        rate_bps
                    ) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

47ad652c97b5e30939fdf9eaa809caf308f16208.query:
INSERT INTO assets (asset_id, denom, total_supply)
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
                ON CONFLICT (asset_id) DO UPDATE SET denom=$2, total_supply=$3

4f9e6ca2890b779cf788f5993de20c8a2b80baa5.query:
INSERT INTO validator_rates (
                    identity_key,
                    epoch,
                    validator_reward_rate,
                    validator_exchange_rate
                ) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)

52c952817de81679a3200e99874d3886d569721f.query: UPDATE validators SET voting_power=$1, validator_state=$2, unbonding_epoch=$3 WHERE identity_key = $4

5fb7b2ea74ad768b7fb7345f0324f6d9e41553d3.query: UPDATE nullifiers SET reverted_height = $1 WHERE nullifier = $2

68ecee6442fbca8293efe210d7b798e0a070f2be.query: INSERT INTO blocks (height, nct_anchor, app_hash) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

6ad227b21367ed03f7a27a5ec65a3499e5edecd8.query: SELECT nct_anchor AS "nct_anchor: merkle::Root" FROM blocks ORDER BY height DESC LIMIT $1

6e3196d9786da554de3d0d93f465ca8207e8bf5a.query: SELECT denom, asset_id, total_supply FROM assets WHERE asset_id = $1

73e0b933842ff451654acd14f7a681c505aed832.query: SELECT transaction_id FROM notes WHERE note_commitment = $1

75ac920aa295d3f8222873fc920fbbaba2663f0e.query:
SELECT
                    validators.identity_key,
                    validators.voting_power,
                    validator_rates.epoch,
                    validator_rates.validator_reward_rate,
                    validator_rates.validator_exchange_rate,
                    validators.validator_state,
                    validators.unbonding_epoch,
                    validators.name,
                    validators.website,
                    validators.description,
                    validators.consensus_key,
                    validators.sequence_number
                FROM (
                    validators INNER JOIN validator_rates ON validators.identity_key = validator_rates.identity_key
                )
                WHERE validator_rates.epoch = (SELECT MAX(epoch) FROM base_rates) AND NOT voting_power = $1

8c67c25c88aef9780fb468fde0efc219247511c2.query:
SELECT epoch, base_reward_rate, base_exchange_rate
            FROM base_rates
            WHERE epoch = $1

8ee50b0f5a24770d8e4d729ec19bcf1a209f93c0.query:
SELECT
                    quarantined_height AS height,
                    unbonding_height,
                    note_commitment,
                    ephemeral_key,
                    encrypted_note
                FROM quarantined_notes
                WHERE
                    quarantined_height BETWEEN $1 and $2
                ORDER BY height ASC

9024aaa179b92038a276abd92a8f20b3a28133ea.query: SELECT height, nct_anchor AS "nct_anchor: merkle::Root", app_hash FROM blocks ORDER BY height DESC LIMIT 1

9efba3ba5ace824dfbf620cd5d9cd46ea8e0e99c.query:
INSERT INTO base_rates (
                epoch,
                base_reward_rate,
                base_exchange_rate
            ) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

aed57af72fe55a40c7fe24c06ff9088213726865.query: SELECT id, data FROM blobs WHERE id = 'nct';

af693a061ba9f39800520cd4092b6d17efe6550a.query:
INSERT INTO notes (
                    note_commitment,
                    ephemeral_key,
                    encrypted_note,
                    transaction_id,
                    position,
                    height
                ) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)

b4889e77812ce68f2ea6bf59c0dbab5a5197210d.query:
INSERT INTO quarantined_notes (
                        note_commitment,
                        ephemeral_key,
                        encrypted_note,
                        transaction_id,
                        quarantined_height,
                        unbonding_height,
                        validator_identity_key
                    ) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7)

ba507b5c58a391df95f9bfac4985ab63e7993833.query: SELECT value FROM jmt WHERE key = $1 LIMIT 1

c3ef567d69223884354c3725f59aee2d163972a0.query:
SELECT height, nullifier, (validator_identity_key = NULL) AS quarantined
                    FROM nullifiers
                    WHERE height BETWEEN $1 AND $2
                    ORDER BY height ASC

c9fa67e55cb9b5fd6ed25b0d64f18b1795bfe54f.query:
INSERT INTO nullifiers
                        (nullifier, height, unbonding_height, validator_identity_key)
                    VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)

d02a1f319b146158c24c3cb76eca9050180306dd.query:
SELECT validator_identity_key, note_commitment, ephemeral_key, encrypted_note, transaction_id
            FROM quarantined_notes
            WHERE
                unbonding_height <= $1 AND
                ($2 OR validator_identity_key = ANY($3)) AND
                reverted_height IS NULL

db8426f28750016ab6ed802dcfcf3cb216e04cca.query: SELECT id, data FROM blobs WHERE id = 'gc';

de1c18af3b0b9dfe6f246ae78075298fc8efc270.query: SELECT height FROM nullifiers WHERE nullifier = $1 AND reverted_height IS NULL LIMIT 1

df15838c798214432eac670477b9ce6838d04cb1.query:
SELECT
                    quarantined_height,
                    reverted_height AS height,
                    note_commitment,
                    ephemeral_key,
                    encrypted_note
                FROM quarantined_notes
                WHERE
                    reverted_height IS NOT NULL AND
                    reverted_height BETWEEN $1 and $2
                ORDER BY height ASC

eb19e8763905f060f3f9341d4fc5f2970ebc678c.query:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (identity_key)
            identity_key,
            epoch,
            validator_reward_rate,
            validator_exchange_rate

            FROM validator_rates
            WHERE epoch <= $1
            ORDER BY identity_key, epoch DESC

ebeb8d290f5ee97174d57b70ea2898a0e259573f.query: SELECT key, value FROM jmt ORDER BY key DESC LIMIT 1

f53d38021b00811466a282564e20eb45402876ad.query: UPDATE validators SET validator_state=$1 WHERE identity_key = $2
